parameters.name: WaterMarkTemplateIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the watermark templates that you want to query. To obtain the IDs of the watermark templates, you can log on to the **ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) console** and choose **Global Settings** > **Watermark Templates** in the left-side navigation pane. You can query up to 10 watermark templates at a time. Separate multiple IDs of watermark templates with commas (,).
